description.value:
Kord marks you, who have survived deadly combat through strength and fortitude alone, rendering you indomitable in battle.

Alternative Reward: Divine Boon - Rare

Property:

You gain a +2 item bonus to death saving throws. When you use your second wind, you gain a +2 item bonus to your next damage roll with a melee weapon attack before the end of your next turn.

Level 15 or 20: +4 item bonus to the damage roll.

Level 25 or 30: +6 item bonus to the damage roll.

Power ✦ Encounter (No Action)

Trigger: You spend a healing surge while prone.

Effect: You can stand up as a free action.

Power ✦ Daily (No Action)

Trigger: You succeed on a saving throw.

Effect: You regain hit points equal to the level of this boon.
